definition: "long stride" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 54), occurring in 建, 延, 廷 etc
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Wish God leads them to the way to reborn…
sentences.chinese: 愿他们能尽快找到轮廻的道路。

sentences.english: Significantly the ileum of the female and male rat was more sensitive to estrogen than the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 雌性和雄性大白鼠廻肠对雌性素的反应较子宫灵敏。
